pageContext.claim: “To me it seems to be pretty obvious when you look at what happened with Carter Page and it's -- they were spying. The attorney general said it better than anybody the other day when he was asked. ‘Yes, I think they were spying on the Trump campaign.’ You can't say it any better than that. And I think so, too.”
pageContext.analysis: The FBI began to eavesdrop on Carter Page after he left the Trump campaign, securing a warrant from the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Court.
